name: Infinity Jackpot - Classic Vegas Slots Machine
name_original: Infinity Jackpot - Classic Vegas Slots Machine
description:
Download and Play Infinity Jackpot Slots Machine and WIN HUGE AMOUNT OF MONEY!
Amazing bonus slots with epic fun and chance to double your winning on every spin! Get FREE COINS EVERY 5 MINUTES so you never run out of money! Featuring GREAT PAYOUT AMOUNT and Vegas style gameplay, you can never get enough when you spin and win! Infinity Jackpot Slots Machine is like a trip to Las Vegas in the palm of your hand. Try your luck at the wheel of fortune where you can WIN UP TO 4X YOUR WINNING! Enjoy and relax while you enjoy beautiful animations and great sounds effects of a LAS VEGAS slots machine.

Download and get a chance to get rich for free and get free credits all day long! Free Spins, Online Jackpot, Wheel of Fortune and HUGE payouts are all waiting for you in the small size game. No internet connection required and no money needed!

Infinity Jackpot Slots Machine was created with the relax atmosphere of LAS VEGAS in mind without compromising on quality of the gameplay. Start the game with $50,000 in FREE CREDITS and WIN THE RUNNING JACKPOT OF $1,000,000! Get free Las Vegas casino slots with multiple winnings options and get bonuses credits for every 5 minutes of play. Quadruple your winning and get free spin with this beautiful and fun slots machine

** Features of Infinity Jackpot Slots Machine **
- Free coins every 5 MINUTES
- Classic 5 reel wheel machine
- Initial CREDITS OF $50,000!
- $1,000,000 JACKPOT
- Reel Slot feeling and sound of LAS VEGAS REELS
- HD graphics and sound effects
- Free credits on LEVEL UP!

Download and Play Infinity Jackpot Slots Machine NOW!

This game is targeted for an adult audience (21+). This game does not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at this game does not imply future success at "real money gambling".
